GET /api/reviews/:review_id.description: serves an object of a single review

GET /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments by review id

POST /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: when a valid body is sent, adds a comment to a review. Serves the added comment

PATCH /api/reviews/:review_id.description: when a valid body is send, updates the vote element within a review. Serves the updated review

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes a comment as per comment_id
